name: CarrierUSB
description:
Operation Method

-Press W/A/S/D → Move

-Press Space bar → Jump

Game Contents

1. Receive data from the main PC first.

2. Deliver the received data to the PC that wants the data.

3. If you bump into things on the way, the data inside will be damaged.

4. Try not to bump into each other. Let's dodge cleanly.
